intents.response_en: Welcome to the hospital. How can I help you find your way today?
The Cardiology Department is on the 3rd Floor in Wing B.
The Eye Department (Ophthalmology) is on the 1st Floor, next to the main staircase.
Radiology and Imaging is located in the Basement. Please take the main elevators down.
The Emergency Department has a separate entrance at the back of the hospital. Please follow the red signs.
The 24/7 Pharmacy is on the Ground Floor, right next to the main entrance.
Visiting hours for most wards are from 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM.
